Topic.Title: How do I not display the room name?

Posts.EditableText:
Hi,

I've only just begun learning quest.

I want to show only the room description.  When I "look", is there a way to hide the room name or room alias?

When I enter the command "look", I don't want to see: You are in a lounge.

Thanks.

Amy
Posts.HTML:
Hi,

I've only just begun learning quest.

I want to show only the room description. When I "look", is there a way to hide the room name or room alias?

When I enter the command "look", I don't want to see: You are in a lounge.

Thanks.

Amy

Posts.EditableText:
Sure, go to game / Room description and set Room name =0
[attachment=0:27idm6tb]<!-- ia0 -->pic1.jpg<!-- ia0 -->[/attachment:27idm6tb]
Posts.HTML: Sure, go to game / Room description and set Room name =0

Posts.EditableText: Thanks, that did the trick.
Posts.HTML: Thanks, that did the trick.
